page.title: 20THE HIGH STREET HENFIELD.
page.content: The High Street is the shopping area of Henfield. Probably the most important shop in the Village is the Post Office which is also a general stores. There is one supermarket and two butchers. There are two excellent bakeries which bake on the premises There is a chemist which is important especially to the old people. There are greengrocers, fresh fish shop and one hardware store. There are several banks and building societies. There are also clothes shops and newagents, in fact you don't really have to leave the Village to go shopping. Many villagers however prefer to do their main shop in the nearby larger towns because it is cheaper. There are antique and gift shops and a Gun shop for those who like sport. The smithy still works and it is fun to watch the blacksmith.
